backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a dental clinic app managing appointments, reviews, doctors, services, user profiles, and clinic status with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a fix to the BookAppointmentDialog component to prevent the connection-error/retry banner from appearing on initial load or due to stale localStorage data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, and page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app titled 'XYZ Dental Clinic' that mounts the app into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with public and admin route trees, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and shared layout components including Header, Footer, and ClinicStatusBanner.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that verifies both a sessionStorage admin flag and a valid Internet Identity before granting access to admin routes, redirecting unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Animated background component that renders floating dental emoji particles using requestAnimationFrame with fade-in/out lifecycle management.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: Renders a draggable before/after image comparison slider component supporting mouse and touch events, cycling through three dental treatment image pairs (braces, whitening, smile makeover).
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A dialog form for booking dental appointments that persists incomplete submissions to localStorage, restores pending data on reopen, and submits via a React Query mutation with success/error state handling.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top-of-page banner when the clinic is closed or in emergency-only mode, with color-coded styling and appropriate messaging fetched via a status query hook.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact information section with animated heading, four info cards (phone, email, address, hours), and a WhatsApp deep-link button.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A disabled custom cursor component that renders nothing, deferring to the native OS cursor.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Displays a doctor profile section with photo, animated heading, bio, key stats, and specialty tags for Dr. Priya Sharma.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders fixed, low-opacity floating dental icon images (tooth, toothbrush, mirror, plus) with CSS bob animations as a decorative background layer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and a hidden admin login modal triggered by clicking the logo.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll nav links, mobile menu toggle, and a 'Book Now' button that opens the appointment dialog when the clinic is open.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a background image, animated floating dental icons, headline stats, and a conditional 'Book Appointment' button tied to clinic open status.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: Two-step admin login modal that first validates hardcoded credentials then triggers Internet Identity authentication before redirecting to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/LiquidGradientBa: Canvas-based animated background that renders mouse-reactive floating gradient blobs and subtle sine-wave overlays in a light blue color palette.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and a loading spinner during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Wrapper component that applies a magnetic hover effect by translating its child element toward the cursor on mouse move and resetting on mouse leave.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that fills horizontally based on the user's scroll position through the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of dental services using static data optionally overridden by backend data, with IntersectionObserver-driven staggered card reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: Renders an auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials with star ratings, using requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation and a staggered text reveal for the section heading.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that types out text character-by-character once it scrolls into view, using the useScrollReveal hook to trigger the animation.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Displays a modal dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: An image component that scales and fades in from a reduced size when it enters the viewport, using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: Provides a React context for tracking and updating a cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: An IntersectionObserver hook that sets isVisible to true once the referenced element reaches the specified scroll threshold, intended for glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, clinic status, appointments, services, doctors, reviews, and before/after image pairs.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: A generic IntersectionObserver hook that returns a ref and isVisible boolean, triggering once when the element scrolls into view at the given threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaggeredTextRevea: Splits a string into words and returns per-word inline styles that stagger a fade-and-slide-up animation when the referenced element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Animates text by scrambling characters and progressively resolving them to the target string over ~1 second once the element scrolls into view, running only once per mount.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Playfair Display fonts, sets up Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares keyframe animations and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: A full-page access denied screen with a shield icon and a button that navigates back to the home route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all appointments in a table with auto-refresh every 8 seconds, displays status badges, and allows inline status updates via a dropdown.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, upload progress tracking, and a description field, persisted via the addBeforeAfterPair mutation.
Admin form page for submitting patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that enter a pending state awaiting approval before public display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying navigation cards for all admin sections (appointments, services, reviews, etc.) and a clinic status toggle (open/closed/emergency) with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing existing doctors, using React Query mutations and toast notifications.
Admin moderation page that lists pending patient reviews with star ratings and allows approving or deleting each review via React Query mutations.
Admin CMS page for editing display name, description, and featured photo for a predefined list of dental services, with upload progress tracking and save state feedback.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service featuring a hero section with an image, a benefits grid, and a booking dialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page that composes all major sections (Hero, Services, Doctor Profile, Before/After, Testimonials, Contact) with scroll-reveal animations applied to each section.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service with a hero section, an embedded BeforeAfterSlider, a benefits grid, and a booking dialog.
Detail page for the Laser Dentistry service featuring a styled hero with a decorative laser beam element, a benefits section, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for the Pediatric Dentistry service with a green-themed hero, a 'Why Kids Love Us' features grid, and a booking dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays a detail page for a specific dental service fetched by serviceId, showing a featured photo, description, feature highlights, and a booking dialog trigger.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Renders a dedicated Smile Makeover detail page with a hero section, before/after slider, included treatments list, and a booking appointment dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL query parameters from both standard query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (teal, royal-blue, CSS variable-based semantic colors), fonts, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations including mesh gradient and float bob effects.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state for an appointment booking app, recording a known bug where the 'Connection issue' retry banner appears unexpectedly, with a feature request to fix BookAppointmentDialog to only show the banner on actual network failures and clear stale localStorage on mount.
